storyInfo:
A Rhodes Island operator is rescued by Scout. When he comes to, he happens to Hellagur speaking with Patriot.
Carrying the words Scout left him, the guard also makes up his mind.

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Huh? Wh- what happened...?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: What am I doing here... why am I laying here...?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I remember! We were infiltrating Chernobog to rescue Dr. {@nickname}——
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Boss! No, no, the boss, he...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: ...Boss...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Huh? What's this paper?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Hold up, this... It's Rhodes Island engineering stationary.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Who could've left it here? What the hell happened?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Woah, that's a lot of big words, and they're all over the place...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Operator whose name I do not know, hide yourself well. I had no opportunity to check your nameplate, nor do I remember your name.
Please pardon the hastily scrawled nature of this message, as I am wanting for time. Do me the favor of reading to the end.
First, do not fret. You are safe, for the moment.
However, you must not, under any circumstances, leave these ruins. The probability of the enemy spotting you before nightfall is quite high.
To put it simply, you are at present completely surrounded by the enemy.
This isn't the boss's handwriting... did it even come from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: They sure wrote a lot. Why didn't they just wake me up and tell me——
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: You came.
(Huh? A voice? Is it Reunion? Shit!)
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: (...No, wait, it sounds familiar. It's that guy from the clinic——)
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: You have managed to completely paralyze Chernobog. I am not sure whether I should be congratulating you.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: We have both contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: It truly is you.
I thought. It was just rumors.
It's been years, Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Or is it 'Patriot' now?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: So. You remember me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Were it not for you charging so boldly into the fortress with that shield of yours, Barclay, Semyon, and I would surely have died at the hands of Kazimierz's Silverlance, Pegasus Order of Knighthood.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: My warriors. Are brave. Do not fear sacrifice.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hm. Your manner of speech is quite different now than it was years ago.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I once witnessed you rousing the troops with your rhetoric, driving even Barclay the Bald Butcher to cheer your name. No easy feat.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The infection. Changed my vocal cords. Now. It is difficult. For me to speak. Fluently. Ridiculous.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: As is this identity you have constructed.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: So, the Northern Tundra Guerrillas... that was you leading them. I never would have imagined you could be running around with dozens of Wendigos.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: That cavalry commander, Alyosha Bluebeard, he made a bet with me that you would become Grand Marshal of the Ursus Army.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Just staff captain, General. Times have changed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...I was jesting. But your loyalty, your record, and the plans you would devise in our staff meetings... You truly were one of the finest officers in all of Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You go too far. I am Sarkaz, after all.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If someone like you couldn't become colonel, the entire Ursus High Command should have been court-martialed.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Of course, most of them are long dead.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Then, I have outlasted them. Your colleagues, are mostly dead.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And, His Majesty said, the army serves the country. Not their careers.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: He also once said it is not blood that binds the Ursus people together, but conviction. What of that now? I can only hope His Majesty is ready to rest in peace.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: All our recent Emperors have seen you as nothing more than monsters. You are not Ursus warriors to them. They have done everything they can to oppress your people.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: That one, more enlightened Emperor. Has already passed. This, I understand.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The war beasts. Of Ursus. Could drown the world, with their numbers. I am not special.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Then it is not because of the Army that you left.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Correct. I do not care. I want only to stand, shoulder to shoulder. With my warriors.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: General, sit. Drink, with me. I have some. From the north.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Time grows short. Let us save it for next time.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Oh... Very well.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No matter.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Go to 4th street. Find survivors. Do not threaten them. Minimize casualties. Look for supplies. Our stocks, are low, as always.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Reunion Troops

attributes.content: I feared you dead.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Life underground is a sort of death. Who I am today has little to do with who I was.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You hide, here? Less than ideal.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Chernobog has long been uninhabitable. The Catastrophe makes little difference to that effect.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Seems you must leave.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The clinic has been extensively looted. We evacuated beforehand, but the loss is still substantial.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: It was only after I heard the rumors of your presence that I decided to stay here and see for myself.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I do not deserve, such attention. It is dangerous, here.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I wanted only to see how one of my few remaining brothers has weathered the years.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You did not. Those ties broke. Long ago.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...I will find out, who did it. Your clinic. That was, an aberration.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: There is no need. At least, with you here, it is very unlikely that Reunion is responsible.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I cannot be sure. Reunion, can be, hard to control. There are some, communication barriers.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Still, General. You could join, Reunion.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If Ursus was, to be liberated. Then the Infected, and the others, could live. As equals.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Look here. Look around us. Look at this building impaled by Originium.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I see it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This was once a shopping mall. All the people in a three block radius depended on this building for their very survival.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The Catastrophe. Destroyed Chernobog. Destroyed the fortress, destroyed the city. I do not agree with, the methods. But this was, necessary. We had, no choice.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It was not long ago that the clocktower was done up in colorful lights. Another dazzling array hung over the intersection below, bathing it in a warm glow.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The Infected, had no right, to enjoy those lights.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You want to make the lights glow again, and I simply want to build another market. This is the difference between us.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ——There was a time. When you would not. Compromise like this.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Perhaps. There may not be such a bright future at Rhodes Island, but I cannot say I feel much for this place either.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You simply do not, wish to fight your motherland. General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Look at this city. Look at the Infected. Look at the mall, ruined by Originium. Look at the dead.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And you. You have never, been afraid, to get your hands dirty.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Correct. Should Ursus move violently against us, we will not hesitate to fight back.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: But Reunion's actions are rather outside my idea of fighting back. Look at this broken city beneath our feet——Reunion is provoking a war.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: And how many people would die in such a war? How many Ursus lives would a civil war cost?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Imagine it. The Ursus devouring itself. Massacring itself. Obliterating itself.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What if, the Ursus, treated the Infected, as Ursus?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Then, there would be, no war.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Reporting in. The leadership has made a statement: Chernobog is now completely under our control. We are broadcasting on all frequencies.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: The leadership has asked for a situation report from each division.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Right. I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Sorry, General. Wait a minute.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Does Reunion truly understand what they are doing?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: How am I supposed to answer you, old man?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Or were you not really asking? I guess all I can say is we're following the commander.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: No matter what the commander does, we're behind him.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: If it's right, he'll do it. If it's wrong, he'll change.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: We believe in Talulah and we believe in the commander. We fight for the Infected. Got it?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Reunion has won a great victory. And yet I do not detect any joy in your voice.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Should I be? Happy...?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If the Ursus will it, any city, will be flattened.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Such an outcome, is most challenging. This battle, it confuses me. The Ursus response.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The war has already begun. There is no turning back now.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Perhaps. I have been foolish.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: However, if I do nothing. The chains of the Infected, will grow heavier.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Should we lose, our conception of the struggle, we move toward annihilation.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: So you do understand the situation. You do know what you have done.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Yes. We are, fighting for our lives.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Then I have no further questions.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Reporting in!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Subcity Sector 3, damage report?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Spare me the details. Save the civilians. It is dangerous. Protect yourselves. Don't be heroes.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Bring a caster. Use drones to scout. That's what they're for.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Where is it, you plan to go?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Rhodes Island
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Ah, I see. Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But. Reunion has just. Attacked Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Why you...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Amiya and Dobermann, I hope they're okay...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: What should I do? What can I do right now...?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: ——If they move into Chernobog at a time like this, everyone would view Rhodes Island as an enemy.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Why would they do this?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Unclear. But, there is nothing I can do, to stop the conflict.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: We just had a warrior. Fighting alone. A Sarkaz mercenary.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And, the one from, Rhodes Island, was also Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The same sort of misery... There is no difference between them and Reunion.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The masses. Fooled by the Ursus. But to us, we are compatriots.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Huh? A Sarkaz... from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: But a mercenary. Fights for fighting's sake. Rhodes Island's warrior. Has a reason to fight.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: He lost. But he shot dead, many elite troops. The new mercenary captain, was at a loss.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And, the enemy. He led away from the ruins.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: He wanted to hide something. He did.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: In the ashes. Was this thing. Please, return it to them.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: A true warrior... with no name.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: A Sarkaz... Don't tell me that was Scout protecting me...?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: A true warrior...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Yes. You have said as much before.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Thirty some years ago, you wanted to have a test of sorts with me.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Now? No longer.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My armor. You could not pierce it. It would be unfair.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This armor is well past its prime. A far cry from the days when the Army performed regular maintenance on it.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: My armor, is Ursus. I am a, traitor to the Empire. It will deteriorate. More and more.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And that is why you bear the name you do. When the Empire has done wrong, you stand up to her.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I cannot say, General. I did not choose, this name.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: 'Patriot,' is war with Ursus the correct course of action?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Naturally. Our war, is righteous. If not, the countless sacrifices. Were in vain.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: General. We both know, the true solution.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But they must not, die in vain. Their deaths. Must have meaning.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But you have already risen up, against Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: What I oppose. Is the Empire. Not the land. Not the people. Not Ursus itself.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If the Minister of Medicine. Did this. He is our enemy.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If a conspiracy, of the legislature. We overthrow the legislature.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If the Army, fabricated resistance. We destroy the army.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Talulah's goals are broad. Far-reaching. Mine are localized. And specific.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The past wars of Ursus, were just. Now, the war of the Infected, is just.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I fight for justice. Justice, forever belongs to Ursus.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Reporting in! We have arrested some Reunion operatives who engaged in undisciplined behavior during the uprising. Here are their names!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: There were no operatives from Teams 2, 3, or 6 among the primary instigators.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: These are but a small part.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Well, I'm afraid... this was a difficult investigation.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Many of our comrades despise the Chernobogians. They're hesitant to inform on each other...
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: This undisciplined behavior. They laid hands on civilians?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Didn't they deserve it, after how cruel and uncaring they were?!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Were it not for them, how many more Infected would have made it? Please, Commander...!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: They laid hands on civilians?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Listen.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hang them. The instigators. Have my men, do it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Tell them. Mephisto. Crownslayer.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ......Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...The rest, demerits.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: D- demerits, sir?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: One more infraction, death. All of this, inform the leadership.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Right! Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Hate. Has grown too deep.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If we don't fight. Hate overwhelms. It will blind Ursus.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I never imagined Reunion was so disorganized... And when you always had such high expectations for discipline. Higher than most Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Most of them, are not soldiers. They have no training. They must be taught. In discipline, we have strength.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: As your conflict continues to intensify, neither side will be able to sue for peace. Perhaps you are right. This is the awakening Ursus needs.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: General, you could. Help us.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I am afraid not, 'Patriot.' I will never again step into a war.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...Indeed. This is, a war.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You do not, wish to fight. This, I know.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Ursus no longer has anything for me. Time has run its course.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I no longer feel for the country what I once did. Forgive me. The man who stands before you is nothing but a spineless coward.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: No! No. You are not.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Would that, my son, had lived. I would not, have walked this path. I understand you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: He... what?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...He was a great man. I am sorry.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Why apologize, General? You did nothing. I am damned.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oh, yes. The knife in your hand. Yes. You adopted, the daughter, of the enemy commander.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My daughter, is older. When, next we meet. I will bring her.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hah. I hope they get along.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: We have wounded! Get their blood types! Don't mix up the Infected and Uninfected! Quickly!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier A

attributes.content: You can give Uninfected blood to the Infected!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier B

attributes.content: Who's the next of kin?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier A

attributes.content: Forget it, just get to safety! Britt... move it!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier A

attributes.content: Talulah's attack, on Rhodes Island. This misunderstanding. Will be hard to, clear up.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I do not wish, to fight you. If this cannot, be solved.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This may go beyond what we can solve ourselves.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It saddens me. That we cannot, once again, fight side by side.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Listen to me, 'Patriot...'
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I alone have never been able to decide the fate of Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Countless generals before me have sought to become masters of the Empire's destiny, and to a man they all died miserable failures.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Just as the many emperors have escaped the wrath of history.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: The Empire has weathered its crises and enjoyed its golden ages. The sorcerors can divine the Empire's future, the ministers can plan the outcomes of campaigns, courtiers can study the shifting Catastrophes...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I have never participated in any political machinations. Not in the legislature, not in the army. Never.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: They always embarrassed me with their confidence. Everyone who thought his victory certain saw his dreams shattered. Everyone who thought his survival assured is now dead.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Mama, what are we going to eat tonight?
Potatoes again? I, I don't wanna eat boiled potatoes again!
Huh? You have to go fight? Mama, you don't have to fight.
Uncle, does Mama have to go with you again? I want her to stay! I don't want Mama to go!
Uncle, please make Mama stay. When Daddy went with you, he never came back...
I don't wanna be alone again, Uncle...
Win or lose, a war is a war.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: And where we go, ruin follows. Only ruin.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: We are but pawns on the chessboard of war. And who cares for the pawns? Who cares to even know their names?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You, are correct. I, am correct. War, doesn't care, who is correct.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Yet you persist. I persist.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: For what? 'Patriot' of Reunion, I ask you:
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: No matter what meaning your war may hold...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: After however many years this Ursus campaign takes, when you have filled mass graves in a dozen cities, will their lives have meant anything? Will anyone remember their names?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Names? Mean nothing. Warriors don't think, of these things.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You call them warriors...
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Sometimes, these nameless people cannot articulate their reasons for joining in battle.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Now, they have no chance to do so.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I have grown tired of such things. I now wish only to protect those around me. At least this small thing is within my power.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: To Ursus, to the Infected,
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: This is all I can say.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I can't blame you, General. You don't need, to face death again.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oripathy, will kill me, sooner or later. I am a warrior. I want my death, to have meaning.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I am glad you have a reason to keep fighting. I truly hope you will find happiness.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: ...Hm. General. Listen.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You don't fear death. If you did, you would be, at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You stay. You listen. You don't fear Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You want to know. Reunion's goal.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: In fact, I want to know what you plan for the Infected of Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Then. I will, tell you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You are tired, of fighting. I fight, for you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The rights, of the Infected. You and your children. I fight to free you, all.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You are tired, of fighting. Good. Wallow in disgust. To end war, is also good.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My days, are numbered. I will fight, to the end.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You truly are an Ursus.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: And this truly is a tragic war.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: It may come to pass that I never again set foot on Ursus soil.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: Listen well, Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You shall not be my enemy. Ever.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I do regret. That I never, served under you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: General, you shall not, be my enemy. Either.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It's late, General. My men will, get you out, of the city. Easily.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I would not want to cause problems for you with your leadership.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: You won't. General.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: She does not care.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Splendid. Then I accept.
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: General!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hellagur

attributes.content: I hope... I pray...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: That you find yourself. A true home, for yourself.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Scout... why did you do this for me?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I'm garbage! Why did you think I'm worth saving...?!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: What am I even doing? I just got a bunch of great intel off Reunion, but who am I supposed to give it to?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Maybe we got them all wrong? I guess if we could clear up this misunderstanding, maybe we wouldn't have to...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Oh right... this paper. Were there any orders written on it?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I can do it, Scout... anything you tell me to do...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I won't let the boss down...!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I have a humble request, if I might be so bold. As recompense, I took the liberty of treating your wounds. You are, for the time being, out of mortal danger.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: So I ask that you entertain my frivolous trifles.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: My objective for this operation is to rescue the Doctor. Amiya is quite insistent on this matter. She cannot be persuaded otherwise.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Ace and Amiya are of one mind. They firmly believe that only by rescuing the Doctor can Rhodes Island break this deadlock.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Assuming the good Doctor retains the same mental faculties as before, Rhodes Island might well be looking at a golden age.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But weak as I am, I am uncertain...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I am not certain I have the fortitude to undertake such a golden age.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: What...? What does that mean?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Over the past three years, I have suffered many losses, and bid farewell to those like unto my own flesh and blood.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I always believed that as long as one of us lived on, we could someday be reunited. In this spirit I have served Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But having lost so much, now I see that even a perpetual pessimist like Misery seeks to bring back the Doctor.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: He believes with every fiber of his being that we are destined for a future of endless victories, that we shall put death and loss behind us.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I do not share this belief.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: It is not that I doubt the Doctor's skill. The Doctor can indeed tip the scales. Without the Doctor, Kazdel would be dust in the wind.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: In fact, it was the Doctor who taught me what it means to fight.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: And yet... With the Doctor commanding us... looking into the Doctor's eyes, one sees only victory.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Nothing but victory. I see nothing, save victory.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Nothing else in those eyes.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: And so I am left thinking: the truth that Kal'tsit is so unwilling to reveal, does it have to do with the Doctor?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: In these three years, why must we draw more and more crosses onto the photos of our friends? Why do these sacrifices grow more and more frequent? Why do we fight without understanding the fundamental goals of our organization?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I dare not speculate. I cannot speculate.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: If the Doctor must be forged in the crucible of war, then we force this professor to transform from an educator and a researcher into a war machine...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: And as such, it would be a truly grave mistake for us to ask Dr. {@nickname} to march into battle.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: The Doctor should not command even one more battle. For Rhodes Island's sake, and for the Doctor's own sake.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...Forgive my naiveté.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I recognize that my ideas are rather juvenile... and have therefore thus far been unwilling to disclose them.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I can only imagine how the others would laugh at me. I do not like being laughed at. And I had planned to carry these thoughts with me to my grave.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But then it came down to this. And I found the hope that someone might join me in taking up this idea...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I want the Doctor to begin anew.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: If the Doctor could live without any connection to Rhodes Island, if the Doctor could stand again, having no memory of these preceding events...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: If the Doctor could avoid walking once more the path of war, then all would be well.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I bear only this unrealistic hope
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Forgive my verbosity. If you have no interest, then simply forget these words altogether.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Right. There are three things you may not forget.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: First: Say to Dr. {@nickname} the following,
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: 'I will never forget fighting side by side with you, Doctor.'
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Second: my squad.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Slink, Pter, Scorpion, Leafa, Milim, Tipsy, Slanna, Mimi, Mary, Thumbtack, Mudflower, and Macron.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: My squad, twelve of them.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: They broke through the enemy lines and held off their reinforcements. Were it not for them, I would never have been able to neutralize their mercenary commander.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: However, we lost all twelve of these exemplary operators in the course of their duties.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I beg you, bear witness to their actions.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Should one ask, you must tell them for me:
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: While no one will remember the names of my squadmates, they must remember that they died with honor. They did not shrink in the face of death.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Of course, I know many have given their lives in service of the project that is Rhodes Island. No one's death is unique.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: We do not fight for any one individual life. To do so would dishonor their deaths.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Tell the one who asks: they gave their lives for what they believed in.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Finally:
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: You must go on living for yourself. My Rhodes Island brother whose name I do not know, I have said so much to you, not that you should go off and die.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Life is precious. You must live to pursue that bright future.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: That is all, my brother.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Treasure your life.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Why...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: The Doctor... Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Warrior!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You can hear, my voice.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You have a chance, to escape. Wait, until nightfall.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Head south. Avoid the light. You have one chance. Tonight.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: There are many, in Chernobog, who need help. You can, see them.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The choice. Is yours.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Boss, Scout, our brothers...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: I'll do it.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator
